headlines.description: A stunning overhead kick from Alireza Jahanbakhsh earned Brighton a deserved point in a 1-1 draw with Chelsea.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jahanbakhsh stunner denies Chelsea first win of 2020

headlines.description: Aston Villa picked up their second away win of the Premier League season, securing three vital points in a 2-1 win at Burnley on New Year.
headlines.shortLinkText: Grealish inspires Villa to rare away win at Burnley

headlines.description: Leicester City striker Ayoze Perez came back to haunt his former team Newcastle United  with a goal and an assist.
headlines.shortLinkText: Perez, Maddison and Choudhury fire as Leicester sink Newcastle

headlines.description: Tottenham stuttered in their pursuit of the Premier League top four on Wednesday as they opened the new year with a 1-0 away defeat to Southampton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kane limps off as Spurs lose at Southampton

headlines.description: Ten-man Watford continued their fine run of form under new manager Nigel Pearson and boosted their hopes of avoiding Premier League relegation.
headlines.shortLinkText: Watford revival continues with 2-1 win over Wolves

headlines.description: Manchester City knocked off Everton in the Premier League on New Year's Day with a 2-1 win on the back of a Gabriel Jesus brace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City beat Everton with Gabriel Jesus double

headlines.description: An 87th minute goal from Connor Wickham, allowed by a VAR review, earned Crystal Palace a 1-1 draw at bottom club Norwich City.
headlines.shortLinkText: Late Wickham strike for Palace frustrates Norwich

events.name: AFC Bournemouth at West Ham United

headlines.description: David Moyes made a perfect start to his second spell in charge of West Ham with a 4-0 thrashing of Bournemouth on New Year's Day.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham thrash Bournemouth in Moyes' return

headlines.description: Arsenal gave new manager Mikel Arteta his first win in charge after handling Manchester United 2-0 on New Year's Day at the Emirates.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal beat Man Utd to give Arteta first win
